centralized module¶

class centralized.CentralizedScheduler(params, n_channels: int, ues_list: List[ue.Ue])¶

Bases: object

assign_pdcch_to_g_node_b(simulator_tick_duration: float)¶

The scheduler assigns at gNB the resource to be used for scheduling response (via PDCCH) to be sent to different UEs

assign_pucch_to_ues(simulator_tick_duration: float)¶

The scheduler assigns at each UE the resource to be used for scheduling requests (via PUCCH)

decode_received_pucchs(pucch_list: List[packet.PUCCH], snr_list_db: List[float])¶

From the list of received PUCCHs and the corresponding SNR fill a dataframe containing all the proper info for performing the scheduling

decode_received_puschs(core_network_delay: int, simulator_tick_duration: float, pusch_list: List[packet.PUSCH], is_received: List[bool])¶

From list of received PUSCHs to list of HARQs to be transmitted

core_network_delayint

Core network delay in ms

simulator_tick_duration: float

Tick duration in s

pusch_listList

List of PUSCH elements

is_receivedList

List of booleans, true if the corresponding PUSCH has been correctly received, false otherwise

harq_listList

List of HARQ elements

e2e_latencyDataframe

Dataframe of E2E latencies for each UE and each packet

generate_pdcch_list()¶

The scheduler generates a list of PDCCH, one for each UE which has successfully sent its PUCCH

get_n_pusch_rb()¶
get_received_pucchs()¶
get_ues_ul_buffer(ues_set: Optional[List[int]] = None)¶

The scheduler does not have access to uplink buffers unless it asks for them to the users.

set_n_pusch_rb(n_pusch_rb: int)¶
